resources.string: NSTUinfo
Settings
SecondActivity
Introduction

The natural setting along with its human habitations of the Southern regions of Bangladesh has been endowed with the vast and immense potentials that can fully be harnessed only through creation of a band of skilled manpower equipped with the latest knowledge of science and technology. In the beginning of its age and expending its activities to spread the light of modern education of Science and Technology and practising wisdom in every field of knowledge\n\n Noakhali Science and Technology University was established with immense hope for maintaining the high quality education. Since its establishment, it is running without any session jam and student politics. This University family is fully determined to gain its ultimate goal of success. Here are all details about the university.

Vice Chancellor
 Prof. Dr. M Wahiduzzaman

Establishment:
 Bill Passed at: 15th July, 2001
 Bill Effective at: 25th August, 2003
 Academic program started from: 22nd June, 2006
 Location: 8 Kilometer south from Noakhali Town, and at the west side of Sonapur-SubornoChar road.
 Area: 101 Acres.
 Faculty: 3

Faculty of Science

Faculty of Engineering & Technology

Faculty of Social Science & Business Administration



Departments:
 01. Computer Science and Telecommunication Engineering (CSTE) (cste.nstu.edu.bd) 
 02. Fisheries and Marine Science (FIMS) (www.fims-nstu.org)
 03. Pharmacy 
 04. Applied Chemistry & Chemical Engineering (ACCE)
 05. Microbiology
 06. Applied Mathematics(A. MTH)
 07. English
 08. Food Technology and Nutrition Science(FTNS)
 09. Environmental Science and Disaster Management (ESDM)
 10. Business Administration(BA)
 11. Information and Communication Engineering (ICE)
 12. Biotechnology and Genetic Engineering(BGE)
 13. Department of Economics
 14. Agriculture
 15. Department of Statistics
 16. Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering
 17. Department of Bangladesh and Liberation War Studies


 Institutes:
 01. Institute of Information Science (IIS)
 02. Institute of Information Technology (IIT)
 

Medium: English
 Students: 4700
 Teachers: 162
 Officers: 76
 Staffs: 154
 Academic Buildings: 2
 Administrative Building(s): 1
 Halls: 2
 1. Vasha Shaheed Abdus Salam Hall
 2. Hajrat Bibi Khadija Hall
 3. Abdul Malek Hall
 4. Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Hall(in construct)
 5. Sheikh Fazilatunnesa Hall (in construct)


 Dormitory: 2 (Teachers Dormatory & Staffs Dormatory)
 Apartment: 1
 

Others : Great Freedom Fighter Hazi Mohammad Edris Auditorium, BongoBondu Mural, Shaheed Minar, Liberation Sculpture, TSC Building, Central Mosque, VIP Guest House, Canteen Shed, Ansar Shed.
 Central Library: 9067 books, 428 journal. Ebooks 5 lakh
 Official website: www.nstu.edu.bd
 Email: info@nstu.edu.bd

Library of NSTU is well furnished containing about 8000 books and around 500 local and foreign journals. Most important feature of this library is online library. Its construction has not been completed yet fully. When it will be started with its full bloom, students as well as other registered people of this university will be able to issue books from the library through online, and also can read the books. It is being developed day by day. 

You can download the Academic booklist in PDF format. 

Download from here
